txt.en: 'When first I found Shelob hiding among these mountains, I was able to restrain her within Torech Ungol with the Gilgelair, glasses filled with the Light of Eärendil. I suspected that Sauron destroyed them when he came to Mordor in the Second Age. It must be true, as the broken glasses remain inside. Now that he is gone, we must restrain Ungwetári and her children. This is the first step to finally defeating the Spider-queen. Take the Gilgelair, and replace the ones that Sauron destroyed.'
Long ago, Celeborn used the Gilgelair to hold Shelob in Torech Ungol. Today, those star-glasses will be replaced.
'It is done? Thank you, [placeholder]. I pray these hold her until we are ready to enter Remmorchant.'
Broken Gilgelair can be found inside Torech Ungol.\n\nYou should replace the broken Gilgelair.
Celeborn can be found outside Torech Ungol, at the top of the Winding Stair.\n\nYou should inform Celeborn you have replaced the Gilgelair.
